评论概述: You have to love the neckline..
评论详情: I tried super hard to love this top because I love the print, the fabric is soft, high quality (not see through) and comfortable, the construction is solid and it has a flattering fit and is the perfect length. However, I struggled to love the neckline along with the flutter sleeves. I have a similar top that’s sleeveless and a slightly less constricting neckline and love it but I think there’s just a bit too much going on with this one. After my kid noted it looked like a pilgrim could wear it, I decided it was going back 😆 If you can commit to the neckline and sleeve combo, highly recommend, especially for the value pricing!
